message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG) as it proposes a new method for dimension reduction in latent Dirichlet allocation (LDA), which is a popular topic modeling technique in machine learning. Additionally, the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed method on document classification, which is a common task in machine learning. 

The paper also relates to natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (cs.CL) as LDA is often used for topic modeling in text data. 

Information retrieval (cs.IR) is another possible sub-category as LDA is commonly used for document clustering and retrieval. 

Artificial intelligence (cs.AI) is also a possible sub-category as LDA is a popular technique for unsupervised learning, which is a common task in AI. 

Finally, the paper may also relate to social and information networks (cs.SI) as topic modeling is often used for analyzing social media data and other types of network data.
